  • Constructor Details

    • PuntoBancoGame

      public PuntoBancoGame(Player player)
      Constructor class. Grabs a player by reference and creates a CardDeck object to draw cards from.

  • Method Details

    • playRound

      public void playRound() throws IOException
      Creates hands for the player and banker and manages the logic of the game itself. Manages if and how the player draws their cards, and calls getBankerAction() to get the banker's response Calls TallyPoints() to tally up the points.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • getBet

      public void getBet()
      Inputs the user's chosen bet amount.
      Parameters:
      Takes - user input to find the bet amount

    • promptGameType

      public char promptGameType()
      Checks which participant the user bets on: either a player win, a banker win or a tie
      Returns:
      Returns the user's choice

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      Duplicates a card from the deck, then removes it from the deck.
      Returns:
      returns the drawn card

    • countPoints

      public int countPoints(ArrayList<Card> hand)
      Parameters:
      Takes - an arraylist of type Card. Iterates through a player's hand and adds all their cards to a sum. Cards with face ranks or rank 10 are ignored.
      Returns:
      returns the amount of points in a given hand of cards.

    • getBankerAction

      public void getBankerAction(boolean playerDrew)
      Governs the actions of the banker, based on the points that the player and banker have earned. If the player and banker both meet conditions relative to oneanother, the banker draws a new card.
      Parameters:
      playerDrew - whether or not the player drew a card

    • displayResults

      public void displayResults()
      Displays the cards that the player and banker have drawn No parameters or returns. Purely visual.

    • tallyPoints

      public void tallyPoints() throws IOException
      Tallies up the points of the player and banker, and displays whether or not the user has won. Also increases the user's win count and wealth if they win, and takes away wealth if they lose.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • promptRepeat

      public char promptRepeat()
      Asks the user if they wish to start another round
      Returns:
      returns the user's choice

    • awardPoints

      public boolean awardPoints()
      Checks if the user has won
      Returns:
      whether or not the user has won
